name: 02-Price-Optimization-Workflow-Npyspark
parameters: --var selectTrainCategory='Poultry','Egg' --var workflow_30_selectmodels=GBR,RF,DT --var workflow_30_dependentvariable=LOG_SALES_VOLUME --var workflow_30_lossfunction=MAPE --var combinedVisual=false --var ValidationWeek=2 --var workflow_30_independentvariables=LOG_PRD_PRICE,EVENT,SVD --var workflow_30_transformvariables=PACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR1,PACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR2,PACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR3 --var workflow_30_adstockvariables=ADV_SPEND

fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.description: select dependent variable column name

fields.title: Adstock Variables
fields.description: select Adstock variable column names

fields.title: Set Price Mapping
fields.description: For selecting the field related to price mapping for revenue parabola calculation.

fields.title: Encoding
fields.description: Decodes the CSV files by the given encoding type

fields.description: Sets a single character used for escaping quoted values where the separator can be part of the value

nodes.name: Dataset Structured
nodes.description: This Node creates a DataFrame by reading data from HDFS, HIVE etc. The dataset was defined earlier in Fire by using the Dataset Feature. As a user, you just have to select the Dataset of your interest.

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: dataset
fields.title: Dataset
fields.description: Selected Dataset

nodes.name: Row Filter
nodes.description: This node creates a new DataFrame containing the rows that satisfy the given condition

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: conditionExpr
fields.title: Conditional Expression
fields.description: The filtering condition. Rows not satisfying given condition will be excluded from output DataFrame. eg: usd_pledged_real > 0 and (category = 1 or category == 2) and goal > 100

nodes.name: Cast To Single Type
nodes.description: This node creates a new DataFrame by casting the specified input columns to a new data type

fields.name: replaceExistingCols
fields.title: Replace Existing Cols?
fields.description: Whether to replace existing columns or create new ones?

nodes.name: Drop Null Rows for Selected Columns
